responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "8E0A4D544E71A931DBB712AACB9CB096", "The Lamp of Malgus is a magical prison used to bind the body and power a single djinn named Malgus. He was captured and bound sometime in the Second Age. At some point in the far future he was released and transferred to a greater djinn prison, the Volton Well. This well is massive and deep and siphons off the unlimited essence of Malgus to power the entire gobbun civilization. The last known location of the Lamp of Malgus was within the vaults of Carphin during the Great War of the Undying.")
name: MIDD_0015_AAV_ClockworkCodex_28
